title: (x) IKKS / Reset Outerwear - Clarendon Ext / Lucida Sans, MS Trebuchet {George, Yves}
content:
Hello! I need to know what's this 2 fonts and I don't have so much time... You're my best chance today!

| Attachment | Size |
| --- | --- |
| [IKKS+Reset.jpg](http://web.archive.org/web/20150426204453/http:/typophile.com/files/IKKS+Reset.jpg) | 18.41 KB |
author: Philippe

comments.content: Philippe, I'm getting a "Page Not Found" error, so I can't see your sample.

The 2 links:  
 [http://www.ikks.com](http://web.archive.org/web/20150426204453/http:/www.ikks.com/ "http://www.ikks.com")  
 [http://stonefashion.com/uk\_reset.html](http://web.archive.org/web/20150426204453/http:/stonefashion.com/uk_reset.html "http://stonefashion.com/uk\_reset.html")  
I'm looking for the IKKS and the Reset logos types.  
Thank you Yves!

for **IKKS** [Clarendon Extend](http://web.archive.org/web/20150426204453/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/woodentypefonts/clarendon-extended/clarendon-extended/) will get you pretty close.

**reset** looks like [Lucida Sans Roman](http://web.archive.org/web/20150426204453/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/ef/lucida-sans/ef-roman/)
